source.name: Permit Compliance System (PCS) Widget
source.description: The Permit Compliance System (PCS) widget allows users to enter a specific geography and retrieve companies that have been issued permits to discharge waste water into rivers in the area of interest as reported by the Permit Compliance System.

datasets.name: Permit Compliance System (PCS) Widget
